[NEW] REVOSA Boomers by Lula | cmdr-nova@internet:~$
[NEW] REVOSA Boomers by Lula

Author: @cmdr_nova@mkultra.monster

Published: 29 Oct 2015


Today I bring you a pair of 100% mesh headphones for your head! These are non-rigged and they come with an easy peasy color change HUD.

This particular item was made for the November Firestorm free hunt thing but as usual with applying to be part of something dominated by super big-time developers, I heard nothing in return. Therefore I’m selling them!

They’re also a cool 1 land impact for those who might want to use them as desk props or whatever without worrying about it swallowing up your entire parcel!

Marketplace: https://marketplace.secondlife.com/p/REVOSA-Boomers-by-Lula/7969244

Inworld: http://maps.secondlife.com/secondlife/Pisces/172/239/29
